Tech Art Game Contact

Tech

LegendVC

A Version Control software designed to manage large files and projects. Currently in development, uses JSON to manage the repository's structure and pointers to real data.

Blender Square UVs Addon

A UV Squaring algorithm for Blender. Essentially a means of automating an otherwise menial task often used in stylised 3D art. Uses with blender's bmesh API, which uses the most obscure graph implementation known to man in order to manipulate 3D geometry.
